text: Background is a 1973 American self-portraitThe Quest of Carman D'Avino, the entire 2000 documentary on 4th Coast Productions' YouTube channel short documentary film directed by Carmen D'Avino.The Films of Carmen D'Avino|Cartoon Brew ==Accolades== It was nominated for an Academy AwardRemembering Carmen D'Avino|NCPR News for Best Documentary Short.Annecy > About > Archives > 1973 > Official Selection > Film IndexDocumentary Winners: 1974 Oscars ==Preservation== The film was preserved by the Academy Film Archive in 2012. ==See also== * List of American films of 1973 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 films Category:1973 documentary films Category:1973 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films
title: Background (1973 film)
